Package main.java.model

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
main.java.model.Ball
Direct Known Subclasses:
RubberBall
public abstract class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
Ball is an abstract class that handles the ball movement in game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Ball​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB, java.awt.Color inner, java.awt.Color border)
    Ball constructor creates the ball as well as handles the ball movement Set the initial speed of ball of x and y direction to 0 at the start of the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkFire()
    checkFire method is to check whether the current status of the ball is on fire or not.
    java.awt.Shape getBallFace()
    getBallFace is a Getter Method to get the ballFace.
    java.awt.Color getBorderColor()
    getBorderColor is a Getter Method to get the border color of the ball.
    java.awt.Color getInnerColor()
    getInnerColor is a Getter Method to get the inner color of the ball.
    java.awt.geom.Point2D getPosition()
    getPosition is a Getter Method to get the ball's center position.
    int getSpeedX()
    getSpeedX is a Getter Method to get the speedX
    int getSpeedY()
    getSpeedY is a Getter Method to get the speedY
    void move()  
    void moveTo​(java.awt.Point p)
    moveTo method will implements the ball shape and location when ball resets.
    void reverseX()
    reverseX is to reverse the ball speed in x axis direction.
    void reverseY()
    reverseY is to reverse the ball speed in y axis direction.
    void setFireball​(int seconds)
    setFireball is activated when the ball picks up the fireball powerup.
    void setSpeed​(int x, int y)
    setSpeed is Setter Method to set the speed of the ball in x and y axis direction.
    void setXSpeed​(int s)
    setXSpeed is Setter Method to set the speed of the in x axis direction.
    void setYSpeed​(int s)
    setYSpeed is Setter Method to set the speed of the in y axis direction.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB, java.awt.Color inner, java.awt.Color border)
      Ball constructor creates the ball as well as handles the ball movement Set the initial speed of ball of x and y direction to 0 at the start of the game.
      Parameters:
      center - initial location of ball.
      radiusA - width of ball.
      radiusB - height of ball.
      inner - inner color of ball.
      border - border color of ball.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move()

    • setFireball

      public void setFireball​(int seconds)
      setFireball is activated when the ball picks up the fireball powerup. Turns the ball into red color while the ball is still on fire.
      Parameters:
      seconds - time duration of ball being on fire.

    • checkFire

      public boolean checkFire()
      checkFire method is to check whether the current status of the ball is on fire or not.
      Returns:
      setFire whether the ball is on fire.

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed​(int x, int y)
      setSpeed is Setter Method to set the speed of the ball in x and y axis direction.
      Parameters:
      x - integer value of speedX.
      y - integer value of speedY.

    • setXSpeed

      public void setXSpeed​(int s)
      setXSpeed is Setter Method to set the speed of the in x axis direction.
      Parameters:
      s - integer value of speedX

    • setYSpeed

      public void setYSpeed​(int s)
      setYSpeed is Setter Method to set the speed of the in y axis direction.
      Parameters:
      s - integer value of speedY

    • reverseX

      public void reverseX()
      reverseX is to reverse the ball speed in x axis direction. This method is for making the ball bounce in different direction after impact.

    • reverseY

      public void reverseY()
      reverseY is to reverse the ball speed in y axis direction. This method is for making the ball bounce in different direction after impact.

    • getBorderColor

      public java.awt.Color getBorderColor()
      getBorderColor is a Getter Method to get the border color of the ball.
      Returns:
      border Border Color of the ball.

    • getInnerColor

      public java.awt.Color getInnerColor()
      getInnerColor is a Getter Method to get the inner color of the ball.
      Returns:
      inner Inner Color of the ball.

    • getPosition

      public java.awt.geom.Point2D getPosition()
      getPosition is a Getter Method to get the ball's center position.
      Returns:
      center Center position for the initial location of the ball.

    • getBallFace

      public java.awt.Shape getBallFace()
      getBallFace is a Getter Method to get the ballFace.
      Returns:
      ballFace Shape and features of the ball.

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(java.awt.Point p)
      moveTo method will implements the ball shape and location when ball resets.
      Parameters:
      p - Point.

    • getSpeedX

      public int getSpeedX()
      getSpeedX is a Getter Method to get the speedX
      Returns:
      speedX speedX value.

    • getSpeedY

      public int getSpeedY()
      getSpeedY is a Getter Method to get the speedY
      Returns:
      speedY speedY value.
